name: Baldaquin V
description:
Here is my 5th LD entry, Baldaquin 5. 

First of all, my friends and I decided to add a few more constraints for this compo, you can find more about it on this post : http://ludumdare.com/compo/2014/12/05/alternative-limitation/ 

Now you understand why there are so many triangles. 

Please play the game with SOUND, at least for the beginning. 

PS : the blue team invades you at start, that's why you have to crush them !
